mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (fno, orifname, refname, ftype, fsubtype, refno) VALUES(seq_fno.nextval, #{orifname}, #{refname}, #{ftype}, #{fsubtype}, #{refno})
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET orifname=#{orifname}, refname=#{refname} WHERE ftype=#{ftype} AND fsubtype=#{fsubtype} AND refno=#{refno}
UPDATE ACCOUNT SET PIMAGE=#{pimage} WHERE ANO=#{ano}
